frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-disable-unredirect-fullscreen-windows
frozen.shortDescription: Disables unredirect fullscreen windows in gnome-shell to workaround https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=767397 and https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=738719
frozen.longDescription: Disables unredirect fullscreen windows in gnome-shell to workaround https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=767397 and https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=738719
